security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document includes payroll authorization forms and related memoranda for Edwin J. Lopez, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), detailing his appointments, salary adjustments, and payroll certifications.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the payroll records of Edwin J. Lopez, who served as a researcher for the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). The records include payroll authorization forms signed by Louis Stokes, detailing Lopez's appointments and salary adjustments between July 1977 and December 1978. The documents also include memoranda regarding new research employees and payroll certification requirements, indicating that employees must disclose any relationships to current Members of Congress.
title: Staff Payroll Records Regarding Edwin J. Lopez
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
